pkgmetadata.longdescription: Randomized Singular Value Decomposition Algorithms with 'RcppEigen' // Randomized Singular Value Decomposition (RSVD) methods proposed in the 'PCAone' paper by Li (2022) doi:10.1101/2022.05.25.493261, where we implement and propose two RSVD methods. One is based on Yu (2017) arXiv:1704.07669 single pass RSVD but with power iteration scheme. The other is our new window based RSVD.
